item.title: Student Debt Increasing
item.description: Student Loans A Lot Like The Subprime Mortgage Debacle, Watchdog Says - From NPR While I do believe that comments about “the next thing to blow up the economy” are undue, the amount of student debt and it’s rate of growth are unsustainable for long. “Michael McPherson is an economist and former college president who studies higher education financing. “I think of a crisis as being a situation which is getting rapidly worse,” he says.
